name: Tic Tac Thrones
description:
Hello!

Tic Tac Thrones is a turn-based game where you will duel against the CPU or locally with a friend. The Story Mode is under development and will possibly be available on steam.

How to play?

Put 3 or more runes in line to active it's skills.

You will start with three different runes: Helmet (no effect), Mana (use to buy other runes) and Sword (hit your opponent). The bought runes are used only once, so use your mana points wisely.

If you want to share your opinion about the game, answer this form:

https://forms.gle/MgA4EbmqAUSgkvrc6

Check the games I have already published on steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/ShortStackStudio/
